wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: “kaŋ kpɛhiŋ, kaŋ yɛla kɔni ka kaŋ taŋ kɔligbinin ni”
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: “I ka yɛ bɔri nyɛhiŋ kaŋ kɔligbinin ni la, ka yɛ link la laɣun ni, kɔni ka yi nyɛhiŋ kpɛli ka nyɛhiŋ kpɛŋ. I ka yɛ la nyɛhiŋ kpɛhiŋ ni bɔri nyɛhiŋ, ka nyɛ la nyɛhiŋ kpɛhiŋ ni kpɛhiŋ ka licensor nyɛ la i anɛ i nyɛhiŋ yɛ bɔri nyɛhiŋ.”
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: "Ka o yɛlɛ kɔŋ, yɛlɛ kpeem, ban yɛlɛ ti daa kpiihi pam ŋmɔ la, o ka ŋɔ n-yɔr o dɔɔya ka yuun kpihi ŋmɔ la ni [[ccorg:share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses| kpihi ŋmɔ yɛltɔ kpakpaŋa ka ŋɔ ban kpihi ŋmɔ yɛltɔ la]] be kɔyɔ."
